name: PointCheckout Holding Company Ltd
description: Developer of an online payment gateway platform for small businesses focused on allowing non-eCommerce businesses to get paid remotely. The company's platform allows merchants to accept payment using payment links, an online e-commerce store, API integrations, and many more, clients can also pay using debit, credit, digital wallets, cryptocurrency, and loyalty points, enabling users to use their reward points and redeem them for online shopping and helping SMEs with safe and fast payments.
one_liner: Developer of an online payment gateway platform for small businesses focused on allowing non-eCommerce businesses to get paid remotely. The company's platform allows merchants to accept payment using payment links, an online e-commerce store, API integrations, and many more, clients can also pay using debit, credit, digital wallets, cryptocurrency, and loyalty points, enabling users to use their reward points and redeem them for online shopping and helping SMEs with safe and fast payments.
